ComicInfo.Summary: Holo-ween [Part 2]: With Redjac in control of the holodeck and several crew members including Data, Dr. Crusher temporarily transforms Picard, Riker, Deanna, and Worf into manifestations of fictional horror characters in order to combat Redjac without succumbing to his fear-inducing powers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 22:30:34. [CVDB1024525] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:06:02. [Issue ID 2572422]
ComicInfo.Characters: Commander William T. Riker,Dr. Beverly Crusher,Lt. Commander Data,Ensign Rodriguez,Captain Jean-Luc Picard,Redjac,Lt. Reginald Barclay,Lt. Commander Montgomery Scott [Scotty] (video recording),Nurse Alyssa Ogawa,Counselor Deanna Troi,unnamed Starfleet officers,Lt. Worf,Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge
ComicInfo.Title: Holo-ween [Part 2]
